website_summaries.verdict: WeatherBug hangs its hat on a unique lightning- detection service, but poor navigation and sluggish response make this app frustrating to use.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient weather forecast
customer_reviews.text: Weather bug let's me check the local weather any time of the day. I especially like the hourly forecast so I can prepare for the day. The 10 forecast is also useful. The information is accurate. Severe weather warnings are also included.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Thistlebottom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Weather App for Kindle Fire
customer_reviews.text: This app works well, and has been accurate. Pros: A lot of information available; Pinpoints the station transmitting current weather data; Displays regional weather maps and traffic camera information. Cons: It doesn't allow for much customization; A lot of ads crowd the screen...however, since it's free, the ads are a minor annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hammond

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC APP! 😀 🌝 🌞
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS AN AWESOME APP! 😀 I HAVE M.S., & THIS ALL HAS THE BAROMETRIC READINGS ON IT!! 🌝 IT'S NICE HAVING THAT INFO @ MY FINGERTIPS (LITERALLY)!¡! He!ps me accurately plan out my days in advance - & THEN THERE ARE DAYS I DON'T HAVE TO GET UP DEPENDING ON HOW PAINFUL ANY GIVEN DAY IS SHOWING THAT DAY WILL MOST LIKELY BE A PAINFUL DAY - PER THE BAROMETRIC/PRESSURE READING!¡!¡!¡!¡! 🌞 🌝 THANKS, WEATHERBUG!!! I AM TREMENDOUSLY THANKFUL TO YOU ALL THAT MAKE THIS HAPPEN!¡!¡ 😃🌞🌝
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A Breon

customer_reviews.title: Great app
customer_reviews.text: I love weather bug. I have been using this app for years. I am on this app at least once a day and sometimes multiple times. It is useful to plan for watering and planting my garden. The hourly and animated maps are essential for planning errands to the grocery and Wal-Mart. The warnings are great to let me know what is going on with storms and tornados. In addition it is easy to flip from city to city when on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre predictions in my area
customer_reviews.text: The app seems poorly arranged and seems more full of "fluff" than useful information. I.e. actual barometric pressures, detailed wind history and directions as well as lunar information is not clear on the first page. I find it annoying that you have to save a location as a favorite before you can get a forecast. For example, If I am traveling, I have to save all the destinations and intermediate spots as favorites to check the weather there. Overall, the weather forecasts in my area seem less accurate than other sources.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Weather App for Fire Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Weather Bug is a very good weather app for the Fire Tablet. The only thing that is lacking is that it doesn't clear notifications that no longer apply. If you are away from your tablet for a while you may see alerts for weather conditions that are no longer applicable. This may be a problem inherent in the Fire operating system rather than in the app.
customer_reviews.author: Evan P Dust

customer_reviews.title: One of the best weather apps
customer_reviews.text: Weather bug does a good job providing weather information and forecasts for my family, especially when we travel. Its combination of features provides an easy to use interface for quick and understandable information. The only suggestions I have is 1) provide a future-cast map layer and 2) provide an hour-by-hour or, at least, a day-by-day history of temperature, rainfall, humidity, barometric pressure, etc., perhaps in a line graph format.
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Just a morning moment.
customer_reviews.text: I like Weatherbug because it's so easy to understand and to use. I like the weather map for my area for the same reason, and it is very clear. And it can easily be adjusted so that, for example, I can see an extended, larger area of the country. Sometimes, oddly, the current weather it reports is so different from my location, I think something gets confused, and I get the weather for some other place far away.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best weather app!
customer_reviews.text: I've had weather bug since before smart phones and apps were things. It's very reliable, pulls information from multiple sources and gives you all the data you need about the locations you ask it to look at. It's always improving as well. As a Floridian weather bug has been my go to source for weather information since the early 2000's.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Chaisey

customer_reviews.title: Pollen level, UV rating included
customer_reviews.text: Really like this easy to use app. Weather is just one of the ma y useful features...sunrise/sunset, 10-day forecast, multiple location bookmarking also comes in handy. Even weather alerts can be set for each location. I've used Weatherbug over a year now and it's still my favorite. Simple to use, as accurate as current weather forecasting seems capable of, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: knotintime

customer_reviews.title: I am giving it another week and if I feel like its a waste of space on my tablet
customer_reviews.text: No current weather radar map and never predicts accurately! Said we were supposed to have 60% rain last night, (_which we desperately) and we didn't even get enough to wet my steps out the front door! It has not even once correctly predicted rain since installed! I am giving it another week and if I feel like its a waste of space on my tablet, I will delete it ! I really want to find onecthst has a current radar map!
customer_reviews.author: Geri M.

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Weather App For Fire HDX Tablets
customer_reviews.text: I've been using WeatherBug for years now, and it's always worked well - not glitchy at all. I like the ten-day forecast feature, the Spark lighting detector, the ease of switching from one location to another. Three things I would request to make it perfect would be high/low tide info, world weather radar to better track hurricanes, typhoons, and cyclones, and the local NOAA text forecasts.
customer_reviews.author: mayfayre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Weather App For Me
customer_reviews.text: I've had Weather Bug for years. I loaded with the locations of my kids wherever they are, places I may want to go to on a day's notice, and places I go on vacation or am interested in visiting someday. Then, I can see their weather, alert notices, pictures, traffic cams, etc. I particularly like the animated weather maps and Spark. Spark reports how close the last lightning strike was in the past 30 minutes and has a map of the strikes showing up that you can really zoom in on, which the grandkids LOVE and we use to keep safe when swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee Acosta

customer_reviews.title: the weather is more specific for you and I love that you can watch live radar
customer_reviews.text: This weather app is far more accurate than any of the others I've tried. You set your location so, the weather is more specific for you and I love that you can watch live radar. it's been very helpful during storms to be able to monitor when it will be in your area and you can even watch for lightening.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gerrish

customer_reviews.title: Handy Little Devil
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be on the up-and-up and hasn't let me down yet.
customer_reviews.author: B.L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Total junk
customer_reviews.text: This app has proven to be completely unreliable. Local weather station would be correct for predicting rain for several days and a radar showing the entire area under heavy rain, but the app shows 0% rain. What's more, temps can differ from one tab to the other. Total junk.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. a Go GoTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great  Weather app!
customer_reviews.text: I use Weather bug almost every day. I don't always get to watch the news to get the weather, so I have found that Weather bug is just as accurate. The school they use to get the temperature is right by my house. So it is really accurate. I use it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: This has been my "go-to" app for several years. It gives fast, accurate and easy to decipher information. You can add different cities and check their specific weather patterns making it easier to pack the right clothes and accessories. Overall, Weatherbug is an excellent app to use for all of your weather related needs.
customer_reviews.author: T. K. Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Very comprehensive and informative!
customer_reviews.text: Very comprehensive, good detail, easy to get to daily local and national weather (to see the "big picture" ) . I haven't had it long, so I have not found any problems with it yet. I like to see where high and low pressure systems are, which some weather apps don't provide. I have not yet figured out how to get info for other locations, but I haven't tried yet.I like to get more than just basic forecast and radar pictures. Nice to get pictures and moon phases too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great app
customer_reviews.text: Love this app. It gives me options for local temps and current weather. By local I mean neighborhood. I also used this app when I worked for a distributor. I was able to pull real time or near real time conditions for our out of town deliveries. Between this and cdot we were able to make decisions on deliveries in distant towns and counties.
customer_reviews.author: Stef53

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This weather bug is awesome.I get the current weather and the extended forcast with alot of detail.There is also a live camera shot of whatever area you live in and an hour by hour description of the weather.I use it everyday.Lots of cool features
customer_reviews.author: PelentaForrest

customer_reviews.title: Love this app!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using Weatherbug for two years and it never disappoints me. The lightning map is very useful when planning any outdoor activities. The ease of use is superb and I enjoy checking the weather at locations outside my living area. My children live in areas that can have extreme conditions. One time , I alerted my son to heavy storms approaching his area in Colorado as I knew well he wouldn't be monitoring as he works outdoors all day and is away from any news alerts. Just by a touch of a finger, and I know what is happening. Your alert icon is easily visible, too. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Tiptoe

customer_reviews.title: OK but has defects
customer_reviews.text: Fairly accurate but has problems. Used to be a weather station at pcs school but no longer. App insists on trying to get info from non-existent site. Bigger annoyance is it won't install and run on memory card. I'm running out of internal memory on my Kindle Fire and this thing is part of the problem. Would rate it higher except for that.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!👍:-D
customer_reviews.text: More tornadoes this season so far. But that bad storm night, there were tornado alerts from the app. We almost rushed downstairs in the middle of the night. But thank goodness I had this app! Our tv doesn't have an emergency alert system, so we used this app! Thank you creators of this app!!! Praise you!!! 😇😇😇😇😇
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Hampson

customer_reviews.title: Very RELIABLE weather forecasts.
customer_reviews.text: I've used many weather apps, and found that WEATHERBUG has been the most reliable forecaster of upcoming meteorological events. I will mention that I feel the radar appears slightly sophomoric. However, the lightening strike addition "SPARK" is really interesting. While spending time in Panama City Beach 🌴, WEATHERBUG was flawless in predicting the upcoming rain, giving us plenty of time to plan for sun 🌞, or rain ☔. If your looking for a weather app; don't be detoured by the childish name... WEATHERBUG. This is one ☝worthy and reliable app. I used it often.
customer_reviews.author: Remark504

customer_reviews.title: Much better than Accuweather app!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'd had enough of the pre-installed Accuweather app on my Kindle, constantly freezing or just disappearing & flipping back to home screen every other time I would try to view the radar!! So much more info on the Weatherbug app, great graphics, radar is crisp & clean. Still have more to find out on it, but one thing I really like, it's nice that I don't have go to the NOAA weather site to check daily rain totals, Weatherbug app has that, too!!!
customer_reviews.author: 🐃 Buffalo Blue

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Weather App
customer_reviews.text: I had searched and searched for a decent weather app. I chose this one, and once it downloaded, was surprised about all it's features, considering it's a free app. It's easy to use and navigate. So far, it fits my needs. My only negative comment, the ads get in the way of some of the info. I might at some point consider buying the advanced app with no ads if it's available.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie H.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Weather vs Jitterbug Weather
customer_reviews.text: I use both of these apps Accu weather and Jitterbug Weather but if I had to choose one I would say that Jitterbug had all the bells and whistles. I would have to pick Jitterbug to make an assessment of all the information I need to make a educated opinion to see what is happening in my immediate area. Since it seems that Accurate Weather has the info for this very large metro area I live in has and is four states that it is useful for a very big picture and Jitterbug is more local.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD, SO FAR I!!!!
customer_reviews.text: A very good apk. Have had it for a week or so, and it gives me everything I need to know "about the weather" (even though I'm NOT one of the 10,000 Maniacs), before I head out the door. I don't drive, SO, I do LOTS of walking, SO I need to know what to expect, and to be dressed appropriately. WEATHER BUG helps me to do just that. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: The Rock of '57

customer_reviews.title: Daily guide for living wherever you live.
customer_reviews.text: Living in the Northeast I depend on Weatherbug to know how to dress for the outside weather. The only thing I would like to see change is the weekend reports and National weather as these are so general, and repetitive, that I don't get the picture I need. Thank you for your general help.
customer_reviews.author: revgaile

customer_reviews.title: All the weather news you need, and then some more.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with Weather Bug. It gives me a quick glance of the weather I need and allows me to dig deeper if I desire. The appearance is pleasant and reflects the current conditions. My only complaint is that the nearest reporting station is about 30 miles from my home. We live in the boonies and that is to be expected. City dwellers should have more local reporting data and a better experience.
customer_reviews.author: Ol' Phill

customer_reviews.title: More accurate than other apps
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other weather apps and I keep coming back to weather bug. The sunset/sunrise is a kool asset. I love the motion map showing last 5 minutes of activity. I do enjoy looking at the weather pics, I should upload pics of weather in my area but I forget this little tid-bit. I recommend this app of you like to know the weather in your area. Enjoy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: hotflash

customer_reviews.title: Used to love but
customer_reviews.text: This was my favorite go to weather app. Now I keep getting internal service error, and it won't open since the latest update. So dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ranallo

customer_reviews.title: Great program
customer_reviews.text: Great program. Gives my local information and forecast. You can use this program for other locations using the search feature. I will continue to use and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Weatherbug
customer_reviews.text: I really like Weather bug because I can check anytime of day to see what the forecast is and I can check other cities as well. Also, it lets me know when a storm is in my area and for my family to prepare for what is ahead. I also like the fact that I can check for allergens, air quality, news, videos and anything else I need that pertains to the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had used Weather Bug years ago on my pc, but when I got a new computer I never got around to reinstalling it. For me it was easier just to bookmark Noaa and click it when necessary. Now that I'm using a tablet more it's much easier to use an app for frequently used services and so I started looking for one that was easy-to-use, unobtrusive, free, and not a resource hog. I wish I had just started my search with Weather Bug as it would have saved me much frustration. It meets or exceeds all of my requirements and does it in an visually appealing way. I recommend this app wholeheartedly.
customer_reviews.author: Asylum

customer_reviews.title: "THE" Weather app
customer_reviews.text: Have 2 other weather apps. But, this is my go to. Love the design, can add locations easy, today, hourly and 10 forecasts. Dew point, humidity, pressure, wind, radar & something i really like " closest lightning strike" all this and more visible to you, easy navigation and great graphics
customer_reviews.author: Chatolph

customer_reviews.title: Love the radar
customer_reviews.text: I really like the spark lightning and storm tracker. We had a severe thunderstorm the other night, and by looking at storm tracker and spark lightning, I new it was a bad one before all the notices starting coming in. It's nice to be able to track weather yourself and not rely on commercial filled news programs.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P.

customer_reviews.title: It USED to be a great app...
customer_reviews.text: ...until its latest major update last summer, now it gives VERY inaccurate readings, with 'My location' often being at least 5-10 degrees off temperature-wise than the next location over, a mere 1-2 miles away! Wind speeds predicted are given in single numbers, rather than a more realistic range, ...what happened??? It was such a great app... Go with Intellicast's site...
customer_reviews.author: Marie D.

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is so great for keeping abreast of the weather. I ckeck it every morning for accurate temps and upcoming weather to know how to dress the kiddos for the day. Always accurate, and I have the app on my desktop as well as mobile devices. It does not slow my desktop at all.
customer_reviews.author: supermom

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This weather app is reliable and loads quickly on my Kindle Fire. Reasons I like this app: Does not require location sensor Remembers presets Gives weather warning notifications Options for 10 day forecast, today's weather, hourly forecast, and radar Easy to switch between options Does not waste energy running in the background ----- I've tried other weather apps, and this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: 4Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Extremely helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using weather bug for about one year, and I've really enjoyed having this app. It's helped me know the weather a lot more than other apps, like the original app on my kindle fire. It sucks... This app as extremely helpful! Surprising good for a free app too! So many details! For example, it tells you how exactly strong the wind is blowing, or how much pollen is in the air, or the next months accurate weather! I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite weather app for Kindle. Everything I want to see is right at my fingertips. No rooting around for the data I need, plus it sends my Kindle notifications regarding any untoward weather issues in my area and the areas I designate. So even when I don't check the app itself, I know when something is up. Yesterday I got a notice that black ice had been reported on the roads near my location. The local news stations never reported on that until hours later. I know right away if lightning strikes are close by even when it looks perfectly sunny out. No complaints here whatsoever. A definite 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Weather bug is my go to for weather. I have it on my laptop and both my kindles for going on 3 years with no problems. I expecially like the weather alerts, the radars, webcams, and the different locations you can have set up to keep a tab on the weather in the area's you want. But what I like the most is how accurate the weather seems to be! Its user friendly and fun to use. I recommend this weather app, and tolerate the ads, because its worth more than being free!
customer_reviews.author: niKoLs

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read!
customer_reviews.text: We live in Oklahoma, where the weather changes suddenly and drastically! Weather bug keeps us safe and let's us plan our daily activities. Graphics are easy to read, the different menus give us a quick look or an in-depth study. Our rural life is enhanced by WeatherBug.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and fun to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using weather bug for a couple of years and now I have it installed on all my devices. I've recommended it to several family and friends and they are happy with it too. I love the format and the ease of use. I found the accuracy comparable to other weather reporting services.
customer_reviews.author: Graycee

customer_reviews.title: Can't Do Without It!
customer_reviews.text: I use this App multiple times a day, & love it. 😃. The special alerts now regarding air quality with the fires here in East Tennessee are a lifesaver. I added zip codes for family, and can check how it is in their cities too. Next best thing to being in front The Weather Channel, but with the cities I care about most, laid out in a format that I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: An Amazon Reader

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't live without it!
customer_reviews.text: This app tells me everything I need to know to plan my day, and my week ..when to take the trash to the dump; when to mow the lawn, when to grocery shop, when I can hang the laundry out,, and when I can just sit back and read a book. Just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: SueC

customer_reviews.title: Weather Bug
customer_reviews.text: Weather Bug is a good weather app. It gives the daily and weekly weather forecast, you can post pictures of the weather around you, you can personalize the screen, there's a radar map,when you have wifi it automatically sets up to the city your in for the weather, and so much more. I love the fact that I don't have to get on the computer to check the weather since I have Netflix. You do need wifi to do use it. If you need an easy weather app and want to personalize it, I highly suggest this app for you. (Kik: Peppermentstick) (Pintrest: Anna Thomas Tennessee)
customer_reviews.author: Anna Elizabeth Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Most accurate weather app I've ever tried!
customer_reviews.text: My entire family has used Weatherbug since it was first released, on laptops, computers and tablets. It's our go-to app for checking weather, be it by the hour if severe weather is coming through our area, or extended forecast so we know what weather to expect for the next week while our Boy Scouts are at camp. 5 stars, you've definitely earned it!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Bidwell

customer_reviews.title: I've found WB is a great tool to have
customer_reviews.text: I've used weatherbug for over 7 years. It's constantly improved and I use it not only for local updates but for travel around the country. I'm an outdoor enthusiast so I need to look at long range forecasting too. I've found WB is a great tool to have.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M Conger

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but beware....
customer_reviews.text: Helpful weather app. Does what it says it will. My only complaint is that if you don't adjust your settings, the app will make HORRIBLE, LOUD NOISES for "weather emergencies" in your area. For my area that often meant warning me of "possible flash flooding in your area". Really, WeatherBug? Was it worth waking me up to tell me this? Might seem like a good thing-- being warned about weather emergencies. However, it's sounds are so jarring that you will likely be having an emergency of your own- soiling yourself out of terror.
customer_reviews.author: KRod1109

customer_reviews.title: Good weather app
customer_reviews.text: Weather Bug is replacing the weather channel on my tablet because it does not take up a huge amount of my internal storage as did the WC. Which would not store on my SD card. Good solid info on weather bug but fewer videos. It works great on tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Circe713

customer_reviews.title: You will never regret downloading this one!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this app since 2013 when I put it on my first Kindle Fire and it's the first thing I download on any new device I get. I have tried other weather app's but none of them could even come close to being as good as this one. It even says something that I'm leaving this review because I rarely do this but I just couldn't keep it to myself any longer. If you get this you will never ever regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Skye

customer_reviews.title: Great...but it used to be better...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using WeatherBug for years...in fact, I was a Pro user until they discontinued the paid level. It's still a great tool, so why not 5 stars? Primarily, I miss the historic info that was available for Pro users and, for all users, I miss the Hurricane Tracker and its ease of use in the past as well as the date/time stamp of forecasts (so you know how recent it is).
customer_reviews.author: SF Fan

customer_reviews.title: Usually Spot On
customer_reviews.text: I use Weather Bug everyday. Not only for local info, but for where our kids live or if we are traveling in our RV I can refer to the weather where we are or where we are heading. I have Weather Bug on my Kindle fire, my phone, and our home PC.
customer_reviews.author: DFerrier

customer_reviews.title: Great app, a must have.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this app for years. Starting with my BlackBerry years back when the radar that led to an early departure from a drag race, saving me from the traffic jam I would have had to deal with. It's on my current HTC One, and now on my HD7. All in all, it provides the most comprehensive data you could want. Easy to check changes to wind direction when planning a fishing trip down the shore, the ability quickly change cities, and temperature accuracy is usually right on compared to the weather app that came on my HTC.
customer_reviews.author: Harry T Waters

customer_reviews.title: Great app
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best weather app I've used, and have used it for years now, even before I had a cell phone and it was only on my desktop. It has never let me down and I refuse to use any of the others, even if they're preloaded!
customer_reviews.author: aniceprsn54

customer_reviews.title: Wish the PC version could be this good
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the 'bug since at least 2000. I thought I loved it on my PC but realize my love affair with it was only setting me up for the Kindle version. I've learned the 'bug is usually far more accurate than the local weathermen (who now all seem to be reading the same script) and this version POPS off the screen. The only thing missing is the "chirp" for local weather alerts. Granted, that would ruin a video (I'm loving videos on my Fire HD) but I am learning to live with that. In sum, this should be the first app installed if you need to keep your eye on the weather, as I do.
customer_reviews.author: MadeupaginTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: My personal weather and news desk
customer_reviews.text: This is a great colorful app that does more than look good as HD quality... Additional options and features are paramount when the info you need is there and precise. Highly recommended in any app arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great Weather App
customer_reviews.text: This has all pertinate information right there in a well set up page you can get current conditions quickly. If you want more there are headers to click on hourly 10 day forecadt also details for in depth of the npw. The radar is excellent also all types so you can see all of what is there to see. Choice of weather station is nice and easy to get the station witj conditons close to where you are.
customer_reviews.author: Herb

customer_reviews.title: I depend on this app all the time
customer_reviews.text: My job requires that I stay up to date on current weather conditions. Weather bug stays current and keeps track of weather as it changes. I depend on it everyday. The radar and spark bug help to see where storms are going, and where they are coming from. I have come to depend on weather bug.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: This is worth much more!
customer_reviews.text: I keep weatherbug on my desktop for easy access, I can check it before I even get out of bed. I love in South Carolina so every couple of days is like a different season. This app really comes in handy. It's trustworthy and convenient. Easy to glance and go, or check forecast for different day. Get this app and be prepared for your day and your week!
customer_reviews.author: C.Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I use weatherbug almost daily. It gives me an hourly description of the day's weather. It also tells me what to expect for the next ten days. It is easy and handy to use. I've found the predictions to be very reliable and accurate. I've used other apps for weather, but none better.
customer_reviews.author: movie viewer

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper
customer_reviews.text: This is my second weather app. It's more accurate than the first. Uses local weather data. I live in Bellingham, WA, which is 90 miles north of Seattle. However, the weather is often different from Seattle's, often more like the weather in Vancouver, Canada. I'm pleased that this app accesses local weather instruments. It's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie M

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: I find this app very good. I am interested in the Day or night time temps and how accurate this app is in the actual weather I see outside, and it has fulfilled all my expectations, so now, there is no need to check the real weather by looking out the window, I can actually use this app and it is spot on, almost every time. Very reliable!
customer_reviews.author: Codebreaker

customer_reviews.title: Best Weather App!
customer_reviews.text: Weather bug is the best weather forecasting app I've found. The severe weather alerts and spark lightning radar are great bonuses, if you go camping or spend time outdoors. The 10 day is much more accurate than accuweatther, that my SO used to use. I've used this on my last 4 phones. Will keep using it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read and pretty accurate
customer_reviews.text: Weatherbug is my favorite weather app for several reasons. In Sedona, Az we have many monsoon storms. They come quickly and usually have thunder and lightening and many times dump a lot of rain in a very short time. If I am thinking of going to the pool i can look up where the lightening is happening and how close the last lightening strike was When allergy season comes around I can look up the local polllen situation as well as finding out what trees and bushes are most active now. Weatherbug has what I am looking for in a weather app.
customer_reviews.author: novadoc

customer_reviews.title: Part of my day planner
customer_reviews.text: Have had weather bug for a while now and always appreciate the heads up for the day. When it looks like a storm i check to see the radar and how far or close it may be. Alerts to help know to take shelter or whatever to stay safe. Thanks for all you do!
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: My friend was always talking about the weather bug app. I have weather kitty which shows rain over my location. I'd always been happy with it but lately with all the tropical weather I needed something that showed where the rain bands were and where they were going so I downloaded the bug. I love it. I was constantly checking the radar during hurricane Hermine to see when the rain bands would hit. It was accurate and helped tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: JinxVia

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time!
customer_reviews.text: Uninstalled this app shortly after installing it. I really didn't care abour Laura Ingalls Wilder Elementary as it isn't in any of the school districts near me. I found Cavaleros MS near me as well as Gold Bar Elementary but couldn't seem to make either my Primary Default School Net weather station. I wasted time before giving up. My search continues for a weather app or widget that doesn't make me waste time.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Naslund

customer_reviews.title: Has been very helpful when traveling
customer_reviews.text: We have family in several directions, so in planning a visit it's been very helpful. Weather can change a lot in 300-400 miles . I especially appreciate the storm warnings during the winter and the live radar.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Day and night temps are consistently accurate. This app is packed with information and fun features.
customer_reviews.text: I like the "spark" feature a lot (too much, sometimes). We rarely get lightening here, but I can spend hours roaming our planet, looking at lightening activity. The Doppler feature is helpful in estimating when & how much rain will be upon us. The day's forecasts are almost always accurate within a few degrees, and the hourly breakdown is nice. You overshoot with 10-day forecasts, since they always change -- making a liar out of me a few times. I think y'all should limit yourselves to 3 days out. As an allergy/asthma sufferer, I appreciate the pollen feature, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best!!
customer_reviews.text: This app is fantastic! Gives me everything I want. I love that it gives soooo much info that you may be curious about in your area. Even shows a weather view camera in my area to see how the weather is close by at any given time. Example: it may be sunny where you are, but checking the weather camera set up in your area, you may see on-coming clouds and rain heading your way. Highly recommend this one and the only one you will ever need. You can input different areas of the country to check the weather on family members in other parts of the country. Very cool!! Five day forecast is in detail. Highly recommend. Get it!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I like this app alot. It's very accurate....I like the fact that I can put in any area to find out the weather for traveling or to see weather in a family members area. ! 👍 I really depend on its accuracy for winter weather . This app has everything you will need. A must have .🌈⛅🌞☔⛄❄
customer_reviews.author: nano

customer_reviews.title: Love This App!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this app for a couple of years now so I feel comfortable in my rating. I really find it to be easy to use and informative. I am able to keep track of multiple places which allows me to know what is happening in areas we visit often or have family and friends living there. It also gives other information such as allergy levels, storm alerts, or just gardening suggestions. It has 10 day forcasts, daily, and hourly. It is usually pretty accurate as well. For me it is the best weather app. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate
customer_reviews.text: In my years of experience of using WeatherBug, it seems to be more accurate than the Weather Channel for my area . It is more consistent on a regular basis. My family uses it more often, as well. As farmers, they rely on an accurate weather forecast everyday. Keep up the good work, WeatherBug!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast loading & the info is on the money
customer_reviews.text: The title about sums it up. I tried several other "name" weather apps, but by the time they loaded -- the weather had changed. Weatherbug provides reliable weather information and the app just flat out works. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Marc R.

customer_reviews.title: Best weather app so far
customer_reviews.text: Really like this one the most, have tried Many. Very clean graphics, very easy to read, I especially like the hourly for any day within the 10 day range. That's been Very helpful. Only one issue - you can't poll an up to the minute or 5 minutes for current conditions. That is Extremely ironic for a weather app! Even an hour is unacceptable. It just makes no sense at all since there's Radar that is up to within 5 minutes real time. Hope their techs read this, I'll try again to email. They fix this and it'll be then a Perfect weather app. Then they'll have earned 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: pretty accurate
customer_reviews.text: I find this app a little more accurate than the apple app. Living in Ohio our weather is a bit all over the place and can be difficult to be accurate on a daily basis. I like the alerts that the app provides. It helps to be prepared when harsh weather conditions are coming.
customer_reviews.author: Katie O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Good app
customer_reviews.text: Weather bug has all the features necessary to stay safe in the Midwest. The radar is good, not as detailed as some but better than average. The only negative is that it can load slow, particularly the radar, and the radar in motion is even slower. This can be frustrating when you are trying to determine if there is danger.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M

customer_reviews.title: Been a user for years.
customer_reviews.text: Been using weathering for years and have always been happy with it. Accurate, easy to use with features that are helpful. The ten day and the hourly are very helpful to me as a garden center owner. Have used other apps but this one is my favorite and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jersy

customer_reviews.title: One Great WeatherBug App.
customer_reviews.text: I am one that likes to keep up with the Weather and I am very pleased with how great the WeatherBug (Earth Networks) I have been with a Number of Weather Apps and I have been with this Weather Bug over nine months on my cell phone. Never have I had a App as great and the many great things that is available on this App. I have it on my tablet and cell phone and I am able to get a weather update from any place I am going or update where I am at the time. If you are in need of a Great WeatherBug take the time to check out this great app.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: One of the best of the weather apps. Excellent lightning feature to follow the storms.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent app that I have used for many years. I like following the storms and with the spark lightning strikes feature this app is differentiated from other weather apps. Would highly recommend as they used to charge for there services but now give for free. Really well done.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous12345

customer_reviews.title: Great daily resourse!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I check this app everyday so I can plan my day accordingly. If I have appointments scheduled i know what weather to expect and how to dress with the daily temperature. Thank you for the convience.
customer_reviews.author: rainbobird1

customer_reviews.title: Great Bug!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great weather application. You must be connected to internet for it to work. You can set it up to any location you want to check out the weather, it has a GPS locater on it. It shows the tempurature, on the pull-down on the kindle (where the time is) and you get weather warnings as well. There are advertisements (due to it being free), don't really to seem to get in the way; or perhaps I just don't pay attention. you can also check the pollen percentage etc. I highly recommend this application, it is a pretty good little tool!!
customer_reviews.author: WardIness

customer_reviews.title: Weather Desserts
customer_reviews.text: I live in an area stuck between to large cities and neither one will claim us for weather. We also live just far enough away from the TV towers so I pick up no channels and can't watch the weather on TV. This allows me to get weather in my city and not an hour away, while the weather ladies stands in front of where I live.
customer_reviews.author: tigerlilly5909

customer_reviews.title: Informative
customer_reviews.text: I like the ability to receive notifications for weather alert from selected locations. My only complaint would be that on the ten day look-out 100°-110° is characterized as very hot . For people in the desert very hot starts at 110°.
customer_reviews.author: BrianMachesney

customer_reviews.title: Weather Bug Fan
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this can't be without App since it came out years ago on the PC. The day I got my Kindle Fire, it was the first App that I installed. One stormy night years ago I was in a tornado, literally. I was at a friends house that was pretty much destroyed, it was the wildest couple minutes of my life. Since that night, anytime stormy weather conditions start, the first thing I do is grab my Kindle and check WeatherBug. I can't be without it.
customer_reviews.author: doug adams

customer_reviews.title: Weather Bug App
customer_reviews.text: I rely on Weather Bug to obtain the forecast regarding Winter Storms for Maine. I find the Radar along with the Projected 10 Day Weather Forecast to be very helpful when making Winter Plans. During a major snow storm the Radar is a useful tool when attempting to predict when a storm will be ending. During the summer the Radar is very helpful regarding either heavy rain or Electrical Storms.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Larrabee Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Handy, complete weather info!
customer_reviews.text: Weatherbug gives me the weather info I need. Current temperature, humidity, storm warnings, etc. The hourly forecast is helpful when planning outside activities. I enjoy the posted photos. Lots of good stuff on this app!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri C.

customer_reviews.title: Best all around weather app to keep you informed on how the weather will affect you each day.
customer_reviews.text: Local radar, local weather alerts, all the weather stats you want and then some to keep you informed. Ads are not obtrusive, and are tolerable in the free version. Accurate and easy to set up your favorite locations to keep weather tabs on.
customer_reviews.author: Angelfish50

customer_reviews.title: The best looking radar, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The best looking radar compared to other apps. I'm not so sure I like the updated version as well. The forecast info is always different than the other apps. Not sure which app is the most accurate but this app is the easiest to use. I use it the most. I live in tornado alley and rely on the radar. I recommend weather bug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IMy favorite weather app
customer_reviews.text: I have used this app for almost two years and it has been the most accurate app on the weather in my area.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: All I Need To Know, Quickly Displayed
customer_reviews.text: Really love how intensely local the data this app displays is. The reporting station is within a mile of my location. Also like that it uses less device resources than any other app and I've used all the biggies, even the ones your device supplier shoves down your throat. I live in one of those places where weather can change rapidly and this has proven to be the most accurate and best performing app across all my devices.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymustly

customer_reviews.title: Weather Bee Starts Your Day
customer_reviews.text: Better weather reports in any location you have need for knowing how the weather is going to be. I have been using this app for along time now and find it gives me the reports that are even better than your local and national weather stations. The gave us great hurricane coverage recently
customer_reviews.author: H.White

customer_reviews.title: Kudos to its developers
customer_reviews.text: Great app to stay up to date on local forecasts using your various mobile devices. I use it on my Note 4, my Ipad Pro, and my dad's Fire HD tablet. It is easy enough to use, even for my nearly 70-year-old dad.There may be better apps out there but we have no complaints what so ever about this one. xc
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Tomlin

customer_reviews.title: Greatest and easiest weather app.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several weather apps, but always make sure I have Weather Bug next too any device loaded app. I find it easy to add other locations, and check future weather patterns. I use those features to plan travel routes.
customer_reviews.author: Em K

customer_reviews.title: Best Weather App!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried (and deleted) half a dozen weather apps over the last 4 years. This is the best weather app I have tried. The format is easy to navigate, and Weather Bug gives me information no other app has. I also enjoy the pictures others have uploaded. This weather app is a keeper. You can't go wrong.😀
customer_reviews.author: KCH

customer_reviews.title: All inclusive packed inside the app...no rerouting to web
customer_reviews.text: Comprehensive weather data including video, remote site choices, all space and radar playback, with or without ads, packaged in the app so does not reroute you to a website like acuweather.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler
